<link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;37a9713b.1503</link>   <description> Please nominate your candidate today!   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T12:49:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;37a9713b.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;293b9cac.1503</link>   <description> Registration for the 14th International Conference on Autonomous<br>Agents and Multiagent Systems (AAMAS 2015) is now open! Please take<br>advantage of early bird registration.<br><br>For more information, see: http://www.aamas2015.com/en/REGISTRATION.html   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T21:21:01+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;293b9cac.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;4f86e056.1503">   <title>Call for nominations: 2015 IFAAMAS Award for Influential Papers in Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;4f86e056.1503</link>   <description> ** CALL FOR NOMINATIONS ***   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-01T13:15:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;4f86e056.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;512f037e.1502">   <title>Call for IFAAMAS-14 Victor Lesser Distinguished Dissertation Award nominations </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;512f037e.1502</link>   <description> Please take note of this opportunity!<br><br>Nominations are invited for the 2014 Victor Lesser Distinguished<br>Dissertation Award sponsored by IFAAMAS, the International Foundation<br>for Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems (http://www.ifaamas.org)<br>and to be presented at<br>AAMAS-2015 (http://www.aamas2015.com/).<br><br>Eligible doctoral dissertations are those defended between January 1,<br>2014 and December 31, 2014 in the area of Autonomous Agents or<br>Multiagent Systems. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-17T10:04:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;512f037e.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;fff5e7d5.1502">   <title>Final Call for Doctoral Mentoring Program Submissions at AAMAS'15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;fff5e7d5.1502</link>   <description> Please take note of this opportunity!   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-04T17:31:45+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;fff5e7d5.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d1cea8fb.1501">   <title>Final Call for Doctoral Mentoring Program Submissions at AAMAS'15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d1cea8fb.1501</link>   <description> Please note the dates at the bottom the text!<br><br>Associated with the 14th International Conference on Autonomous Agents<br>and Multiagent Systems (AAMAS\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd15) in Istanbul<br>http://www.aamas2015.com/<br><br>Doctoral symposium date: May 5th<br><br>Building upon the success of previous years, AAMAS 2015 will again<br>include a doctoral mentoring program, intended for PhD students in<br>advanced stages of their research. This program will provide an<br>opportunity for students to interact closely with established<br>researchers in their fields as well as with other students, to receive<br>feedback on their work and to get advice on managing their careers.   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-25T10:18:50+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d1cea8fb.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d59eda70.1501">   <title>Final Call for Demos: 14th International Conference on Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems (AAMAS 2015) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d59eda70.1501</link>   <description> Istanbul, Turkey, May 4-8, 2015<br><br>http://www.aamas2015.com<br><br>The goal of the AAMAS DEMOs track is to provide opportunities for<br>participants from academia and/or industry to present their latest<br>developments in agent-based software and/or robotic systems.<br>Interactive systems, robotic systems and novel applications are<br>particularly welcome. There will be a &quot;Best Demo Award.&quot;<br><br>Authors of accepted papers and posters in the main track of the AAMAS<br>conference, as well as workshop presenters, are particularly<br>encouraged to submit! (You'll be there anyway - this is another<br>opportunity to share your work and discuss your results in detail with<br>conference attendees who visit your [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-25T08:04:45+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d59eda70.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;dc188a51.1501">   <title>Call for IFAAMAS-14 Victor Lesser Distinguished Dissertation Award Nominations </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;dc188a51.1501</link>   <description> Nominations are invited for the 2014 Victor Lesser Distinguished<br>Dissertation Award sponsored by IFAAMAS, the International Foundation<br>for Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems (http://www.ifaamas.org)<br>and to be presented at AAMAS-2015 (http://www.aamas2015.com/).<br><br>Eligible doctoral dissertations are those defended between January 1,<br>2014 and December 31, 2014 in the area of Autonomous Agents or<br>Multiagent Systems.<br><br>This award includes a certificate and a 1500EUR payment. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-25T08:01:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;dc188a51.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;e0bc24b5.1501">   <title>Call for Demos: 14th International Conference on Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems (AAMAS 2015) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;e0bc24b5.1501</link>   <description> Istanbul, Turkey, May 4-8, 2015<br><br>http://www.aamas2015.com<br><br>The goal of the AAMAS DEMOs track is to provide opportunities for<br>participants from academia and/or industry to present their latest<br>developments in agent-based software and/or robotic systems.<br>Interactive systems, robotic systems and novel applications are<br>particularly welcome. There will be a &quot;Best Demo Award.&quot;<br><br>Authors of accepted papers and posters in the main track of the AAMAS<br>conference, as well as workshop presenters, are particularly<br>encouraged to submit! (You'll be there anyway - this is another<br>opportunity to share your work and discuss your results in detail with<br>conference attendees who visit your [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-14T13:45:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;e0bc24b5.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;dd845619.1501">   <title>Call for Doctoral Mentoring Program Submissions at AAMAS'15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;dd845619.1501</link>   <description> Associated with the 14th International Conference on Autonomous Agents<br>and Multiagent Systems (AAMAS\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd15) in Istanbul<br>http://www.aamas2015.com/<br><br>Symposium date: May 5th<br><br>Building upon the success of previous years, AAMAS 2015 will again<br>include a doctoral mentoring program, intended for PhD students in<br>advanced stages of their research. This program will provide an<br>opportunity for students to interact closely with established<br>researchers in their fields as well as with other students, to receive<br>feedback on their work and to get advice on managing their careers.   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-13T23:33:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;dd845619.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d9a74342.1501">   <title>Call for nominations: ACM SIGAI Autonomous Agents Research Award 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d9a74342.1501</link>   <description> ACM SIGAI Autonomous Agents Research Award 2015<br><br>Nominations are solicited for the 2015 ACM SIGAI Autonomous Agents<br>Research Award. This award is made for excellence in research in the<br>area of autonomous agents. It is intended to recognize researchers in<br>autonomous agents whose **current work** is an important influence on<br>the field. The award is an official ACM award, funded by an endowment<br>created by ACM SIGAI from the proceeds of previous Autonomous Agents<br>conferences. The recipient of the award will receive a monetary prize<br>and a certificate, and will be invited to present a plenary talk at<br>the AAMAS [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-06T15:40:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;d9a74342.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;71c03e17.1412">   <title>Call for IFAAMAS-14 Victor Lesser Distinguished Dissertation Award nominations </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;71c03e17.1412</link>   <description> Nominations are invited for the 2014 Victor Lesser Distinguished<br>Dissertation Award sponsored by IFAAMAS, the International Foundation for<br>Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems (http://www.ifaamas.org) and to be<br>presented at<br>AAMAS-2015 (http://www.aamas2015.com/).<br><br>Eligible doctoral dissertations are those defended between January 1, 2014<br>and December 31, 2014 in the area of Autonomous Agents or Multiagent<br>Systems.<br><br>This award includes a certificate and a 1500EUR payment. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-09T11:07:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;71c03e17.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;df7ce6cd.1411">   <title>Final Call for Tutorials: 14th International Conference on Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems (AAMAS 2015) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;df7ce6cd.1411</link>   <description> XIV International Conference on<br>AUTONOMOUS AGENTS AND MULTIAGENT SYSTEMS (AAMAS 2015)<br><br>Istanbul, Turkey<br>May 4-8, 2015<br><br>http://www.aamas2015.com<br><br>The AAMAS 2015 Organizing Committee invites proposals for the Tutorial<br>Program, to be held on 4-5, immediately before the technical conference.<br>AAMAS 2015 Tutorials should serve one or more of the following objectives:<br><br>* Introduce novices to major topics of AAMAS research.<br>* Provide instruction in established practices and methodologies.<br>* Survey a mature area of AAMAS research or practice.<br>* Motivate and explain an AAMAS topic of emerging importance.<br>* Introduce expert non-specialists to an AAMAS area.<br>* Survey an area of [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-26T15:29:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;df7ce6cd.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;94753355.1411">   <title>Final Call for Workshops: 14th International Conference on Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems (AAMAS 2015) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;94753355.1411</link>   <description> The AAMAS-2015 invites proposals for the Workshop Program to be held on May<br>4-5, 2015 immediately prior to the main technical program of the AAMAS<br>conference. The main goal of the AAMAS-2015 workshop program is to<br>stimulate and facilitate discussion, interaction, and comparison of<br>approaches, methods, and ideas related to specific topics, both theoretical<br>and applied, in the general area of Autonomous Agents and Multiagent<br>Systems. The AAMAS-2015 workshops will provide an informal setting where<br>participants will have the opportunity to discuss specific technical topics<br>in an atmosphere that fosters the active exchange of ideas. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-26T15:23:07+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;94753355.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;dbfe3839.1411"> (AAMAS\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd15) in Istanbulhttp://www.aamas2015.com/<br>&lt;http://www.aamas2015.com/&gt;Symposium date: May 5thBuilding upon the success<br>of previous years, AAMAS 2015 will again include a doctoral mentoring<br>program, intended for PhD students in advanced stages of their research.<br>This program will provide an opportunity for students to interact closely<br>with established researchers in their fields as well as with other<br>students, to receive feedback on their work and to get advice on managing<br>their careers.-------------------------------------------Specifically, the<br>goals of the program are:-------------------------------------------- To<br>match each student with an [...]   </description> systems, robotic systems and novel applications are<br>particularly welcome. There will be a &quot;Best Demo Award.&quot;<br><br>Authors of accepted papers and posters in the main track of the AAMAS<br>conference, as well as workshop presenters, are particularly<br>encouraged to submit! rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;31fe6412.1409">   <title>Call for Workshops: AAMAS 2015, Istanbul (Turkey), 4-8 May 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;31fe6412.1409</link>   <description> Call for workshops<br><br>The AAMAS-2015 invites proposals for the Workshop Program to be held on May<br>4-5, 2015 immediately prior to the main technical program of the AAMAS<br>conference. The main goal of the AAMAS-2015 workshop program is to<br>stimulate and facilitate discussion, interaction, and comparison of<br>approaches, methods, and ideas related to specific topics, both theoretical<br>and applied, in the general area of Autonomous Agents and Multiagent<br>Systems. The AAMAS-2015 workshops will provide an informal setting where<br>participants will have the opportunity to discuss specific technical topics<br>in an atmosphere that fosters the active exchange of ideas.<br>The AAMAS-2015 [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-26T10:09:46+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;31fe6412.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;26b0ed2a.1409">   <title>AAMAS 2015: First Call for Tutorials </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;26b0ed2a.1409</link>   <description> ** FIRST CALL FOR TUTORIALS **<br><br>XIV International Conference on<br>AUTONOMOUS AGENTS AND MULTIAGENT SYSTEMS (AAMAS 2015)<br><br>Istanbul, Turkey<br>May 4-8, 2015<br><br>http://www.aamas2015.com<br><br>The AAMAS 2015 Organizing Committee invites proposals for the Tutorial<br>Program, to be held on 4-5, immediately before the technical conference.<br>AAMAS 2015 Tutorials should serve one or more of the following objectives:<br><br>* Introduce novices to major topics of AAMAS research.<br>* Provide instruction in established practices and methodologies.<br>* Survey a mature area of AAMAS research or practice.<br>* Motivate and explain an AAMAS topic of emerging importance.<br>* Introduce expert non-specialists to an AAMAS [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-22T12:49:09+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Amit Chopra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;26b0ed2a.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;42aa751.1407">   <title>CSCA JiscMail List - is CLOSED </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCA;42aa751.1407</link>   <description> We have been unable to find a new list owner therefore JiscMail have CLOSED this list.<br><br>The list is not accepting new subscribers and existing subscribers are no longer able to post messages to the list. The list archives will continue to be available to browse.<br><br>We can reactivate this list if we can find a new list owner. To volunteer please contact us at helpline@jiscmail.ac.uk - we can provide training and support.
